TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type ControlCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供集合容器，讓 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項能夠保留其子控制項的清單。

span.span: Provides a collection container that enables ASP.NET server controls to maintain a list of their child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以存取的任何屬性和方法類別透過屬性。You can access any of the properties and methods of the class through the property. 因為類別是所有的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的基底類別，所有伺服器控制項都繼承這個屬性。Since the class is the base class for all ASP.NET server controls, all server controls inherit this property. 如需有關集合的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 集合和資料結構](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md)。For more information about collections, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫方法用來建立兩個控制項，名為的自訂類別的兩個執行個體`ChildControl`，其中包含字串屬性，名為`Message`。The following code example overrides the method to create two controls, both instances of the custom class named `ChildControl`, which has a string property named `Message`. 建立時，會新增兩個控制項。When created, the two controls are added to the . 將它們加入至類別，其中包含此版本的這些控制項上呼叫方法。The method is called on each of these controls to add them to the class that contains this version of . 屬性設定為`true`，讓這些控制項不會無謂地重新建立。The property is set to `true` so that these controls will not be created again unnecessarily. [!code-csharp[Control_Sample_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample_1/CS/control_sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_Sample_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample_1/VB/control_sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Collections and Data Structures

summary.span: 將指定的 物件加入至集合。

span.span: Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的控制項會加入至循序索引陣列的結尾。The new control is added to the end of an ordinal index array. 控制項可以是任何 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項、 自訂伺服器控制項，您建立或常值控制項的執行個體。The control can be an instance of any ASP.NET server control, a custom server control you create, or a literal control. 若要將控制項加入集合中特定索引位置，使用方法。To add a control to the collection at a specific index location, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用加入項目範本，其中數字會從伺服器控制項的檢視狀態，自訂的樣板化控制項的一系列的方法。The following code example uses the method to add a series of template items, the number of which are taken from the server control's view state, to a custom templated control. [!code-csharp[TemplatedDataBoundControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl/CS/templatedataboundcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TemplatedDataBoundControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl/VB/templatedataboundcontrol.vb#2)]

summary.span: 從目前伺服器控制項的 物件中移除所有控制項。

span.span: Removes all controls from the current server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法可空白自訂控制項的當您覆寫和方法。Use this method to empty a custom control's when you override the and methods. 當您開發複合、 樣板化控制項或樣板化的資料繫結控制項時，請執行這項操作。Do this when you develop composite, templated controls or templated data-bound controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，並使用方法來刪除所有子控制項先前在物件。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method, and using the method to delete all child controls previously in the object. 在此情況下，您必須這麼做使過期的物件，在您的控制項不會顯示在發佈者出現不當。In this case, you must do this so that outdated objects in your control's are not displayed inappropriately. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立方法，以透過列舉的集合控制項， `myButton`。The following code example creates a method that enumerates through the collection of a control, `myButton`. 建立列舉值時，屬性會檢查以查看作業是否具備執行緒安全，以及是否不是，屬性用來取得要讓作業執行緒安全的物件。When the enumerator is created, the property is checked to see if the operation is thread safe, and if it is not, the property is used to obtain an object to make the operation thread safe. 完成列舉型別、 值做為寫入屬性屬性包含頁面上的控制項。When the enumeration is completed, the value of the property is written as the property of a control on the containing page. span.span: Removes a child control, at the specified index location, from the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要移除其值為基礎的集合中的控制項，請使用方法。To remove a control from the collection based on its value, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來刪除的子控制項`myButton`伺服器控制項。The following code example uses the method to delete a child control from the `myButton` server control. 方法呼叫會先指定刪除控制項之前的 1 的索引位置。The method call first specifies an index location of 1 from which the control is deleted. 然後此範例會寫入至包含頁面上的文字訊息，指出已從刪除該位置控制集合。The example then writes to the containing page a text message saying that the control at that location has been deleted from the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples/CS/controlcollection1_cs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples/VB/controlcollection1_vb.aspx#5)]

exception.span: 如果 為唯讀，則會被擲回。

span.span: Thrown if the is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public object SyncRoot { get; }
.property instance object SyncRoot
Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };
member this.SyncRoot : obj

summary.span: 取得可用來對控制項集合進行同步 (Synchronize) 存取的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection of controls.
The used to synchronize the collection.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立方法，以透過列舉的集合控制項， `myButton`。The following code example creates a method that enumerates through the collection of a control, `myButton`. 建立列舉值時，屬性會檢查以查看作業是否具備執行緒安全，以及是否不是，屬性用來取得要讓作業執行緒安全的物件。When the enumerator is created, the property is checked to see if the operation is thread safe, and if it is not, the property is used to obtain an object to make the operation thread safe. 列舉完成後，windows 7做為寫入屬性屬性包含頁面上的控制項。When the enumeration is complete, the value of the property is written as the property of a control on the containing page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples/CS/controlcollection1_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCollection_NewSamples/VB/controlcollection1_vb.aspx#2)]
